Clause: ==Rules of play at casinos==
origClause: ==Rules of play at casinos==

Clause: At a casino blackjack table, the dealer agrees to face five to seven playing positions from behind a semicircular table.
origClause: At a casino blackjack table, the dealer faces five to seven playing positions from behind a semicircular table.

Clause: The shuffling involves one to eight standard 52-card decks.
origClause: Between one and eight standard 52-card decks are shuffled together.

Clause: At the beginning of each round, up to three players need to place their bets in the "betting box" at each position in play.
origClause: At the beginning of each round, up to three players place their bets in the "betting box" at each position in play.

Clause: The player whose bet is at the front of the betting box controls the position,
origClause: The player whose bet is at the front of the betting box is deemed to have control over the position,

Clause: and the dealer ought to consult the controlling player for playing decisions regarding the hand;
origClause: and the dealer will consult the controlling player for playing decisions regarding the hand;
